headline: Strong EPS Growth to Drive Linde plc (LIN) in 2026, Supports UBS Bullish Stance
summary: Linde plc (NASDAQ:LIN) is one of the 12 best commodity stocks to buy right now. On November 11, 2025, UBS analyst Joshua Spector revisited Linde plc (NASDAQ:LIN) and upgraded the stock from “Neutral” to “Buy,” with a $500 price target, down from $507. The analyst’s upgrade reflects the stock’s attractive risk/reward as a defensive growth […]
